content.rendered:
Jetstar Airways Pty Ltd, trading as Jetstar, is an Australian low-cost airline (self-described as “value based”) headquartered in Melbourne. Established in 2003. It is a wholly owned subsidiary of Qantas, created in response to the threat posed by low-cost airline Virgin Australia.

Jetstar Airways Contact Address, Phone and Website

Jetstar Airways Address : Collingwood, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Phone number : 00 61 3 9645 5999

Jetstar Airways Official website : https://www.jetstar.com/

Fleet size: 71

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321-200
  • Airbus A321LR
  • Airbus A321XLR
  • Boeing 787-8

Jetstar Airways Baggage Allowance

View Jetstar Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Jetstar Airways Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Qantas Frequent Flyer

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Jetstar Airways office in Australia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Jetstar Airways office in Australia: (click on the stars below)
